xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.signing

Class SigningInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.impl.AbstractExtension<CONTAINER>
      • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.AbstractInterceptor<MessagingContainer>
        • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.AbstractOperationInterceptor
          • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.signing.SigningInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Extension<MessagingContainer>, Interceptor<MessagingContainer>, OperationInterceptor, Prototype<SigningInterceptor>

    public class SigningInterceptor
extends AbstractOperationInterceptor
implements OperationInterceptor, Prototype<SigningInterceptor>
    This interceptor can sign an inner graph. Warning: This is experimental, do not use for serious applications.
